title: City Route Bidding - San Francisco
description: Seeking bids for 5 city delivery routes in the San Francisco metropolitan area. Routes cover downtown and surrounding neighborhoods.

title: Rural Delivery Contract - Texas
description: Contractor needed for rural mail delivery in eastern Texas. Total of 3 routes covering approximately 120 miles daily.

title: Express Mail Transport - Chicago
description: Express mail transport service needed for Chicago metropolitan area. Daily pickups from distribution center to local post offices.

title: Package Delivery - NYC
description: Package delivery service for Manhattan and Brooklyn areas. High volume during holiday seasons. Vehicle provided.

title: Highway Contract Route - Florida
description: Highway contract route connecting Miami, Fort Lauderdale, and West Palm Beach distribution centers. Daily trips required.

title: Seasonal Package Delivery - Colorado
description: Seasonal package delivery service for Denver and surrounding areas. 3-month contract with possible extension.

title: Rural Carrier Associate - Oregon
description: Rural carrier associate needed for multiple routes in western Oregon. Weekend availability required.

title: City Carrier Assistant - Atlanta
description: Multiple city carrier assistant positions available in Atlanta metro area. Training provided.

title: Highway Contract Route - Midwest
description: Long-haul highway contract route connecting distribution centers in Illinois, Indiana, and Ohio.

title: Last Mile Delivery - Seattle
description: Last mile delivery service for Seattle and Tacoma areas. Focus on residential package delivery.

title: Special Route Contract - Las Vegas
description: Special delivery route servicing Las Vegas Strip and surrounding areas. Evening shifts required.

title: Rural Delivery - New England
description: Multiple rural delivery routes available in New Hampshire and Vermont. All-weather capability required.
